bibl.title: Old Comedy Disguised as Satyr Play: A New Reading of Cratinus' Dionysalexandros (P. Oxy. 663).
bibl.note: P. Oxy. IV, 663 (= Pack2 252). - A. The identity of the chorus. - B. Dionysalexandros as satyr play. - C. The lost section of Dionysalexandros. - D. Dionysalexandros as satyr-comedy.
bibl.seg: BAKOLA Emmanuela, Old Comedy Disguised as Satyr Play: A New Reading of Cratinus' Dionysalexandros (P. Oxy. 663).
P. Oxy. IV, 663 (= Pack2 252). - A. The identity of the chorus. - B. Dionysalexandros as satyr play. - C. The lost section of Dionysalexandros. - D. Dionysalexandros as satyr-comedy.
